skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of stealing 1 random buff from the target.

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing one of the following debuffs for 2 turns: a [Block Buffs] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff, a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff, a 25% [Weaken] debuff, a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff, or a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff.

skills.desc:
Decreases each enemy's ACC by 10 for each debuff they are under.

This Champion will receive 4% less damage for each debuff on the attacker.

Heals this Champion by 1,250 HP each time a debuff expires on an enemy.

Has a 75% chance of placing a Provoke debuff for 1 turn on enemies under 5 or more debuffs at the start of this Champion's turn.

This Champion can place debuffs on weak hits.
skills.name: No Escape [P]
